snippet: RoboReel, a $330 robotic electric cord reel, uses a motor to carefully rewind a 50-foot, three-outlet extension back into the spherical housing.
abstract: RoboReel, a $330 robotic electric cord reel, uses a motor to carefully rewind a 50-foot, three-outlet extension back into the spherical housing.

headline.main: For $330, an Extension Cord With a Brain
